description.value:
Deals 2d10+10 Energy Damage once before becoming inert at the end of the Round. One dose can eat through a 5 centimetre thick square metre of adamantium in one Round.

Requirements

Grey-Green liquid that dissolves most materials in seconds (except in pure-silicate glass) before fading into inert paste.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
